examples.example: 忙完这段时间我就回去看望父母。

translate.english: After finishing this period of busy time, I will go back to visit my parents.

examples.example: 等我完成工作后就回去和家人一起享受温馨的时光。

translate.english: After I finish the work, I will go back to enjoy the warm time with my family.

examples.example: 这次出差结束后我就回去和朋友们相聚。

translate.english: After this business trip ends, I will go back to get together with my friends.
